definitions.definition: A food made from hulled corn ( maize ) kernels soaked in lye water, rinsed, then cooked and eaten; or, the rinsed kernels are dried and coarsely ground into hominy grits .

main_definition: A food made from hulled corn ( maize ) kernels soaked in lye water, rinsed, then cooked and eaten; or, the rinsed kernels are dried and coarsely ground into hominy grits .
